# removeFirst()

**Instance Method**

Removes the first element of the set.

## Declaration

```swift
@discardableResult mutating func removeFirst() -> Element
```

## Return Value

A member of the set.

## Discussion

Because a set is not an ordered collection, the “first” element may not be the first element that was added to the set. The set must not be empty.



## Removing Elements

- **filter(_:)**: Returns a new set containing the elements of the set that satisfy the given predicate.
- **remove(_:)**: Removes the specified element from the set.
- **remove(_:)**
- **remove(at:)**: Removes the element at the given index of the set.
- **removeAll(keepingCapacity:)**: Removes all members from the set.
